summary:
🔸WHO I AM AND WHAT I DO
I work as an independent strategic consultant under the name ‘with mave’. I advise, coach and support organisations for reputation management, positioning, communication strategy, storytelling and media relations. For a list of my clients check my website or job description on this LinkedIn page.

‘Mave’ means happiness (Celtic/Gaelic). I select assignments and clients where we have a click, so my work gives me positive energy. This can be enthusiasm for an organisation's mission, the challenge of a tricky assignment or simply because the people are fun to work with. I thrive on organisations that embrace teamwork, propagate positive thinking and continuously aim for improvement and progress. And the match is even better if the organisation is results-driven and strives to make a positive (social) impact.

🔸BACKGROUND AND EXPERIENCE
All-round communications professional, team manager and advisor to board and management. 17 years’ experience in-house and as consultant, including 8+ years at bol.com, one of the biggest online retail platforms in the Benelux (part of Ahold Delhaize). I'm specialised in building and developing brands and corporate communications as a team within fast-growing companies. I have also been the company spokesperson to external stakeholders, such as media and journalists (including radio and TV), local government, politicians and consumer organisations.

🔸MY CONTRIBUTION 
• I’m the one who dares to ask the sharp and critical questions, takes the challenging approach, and makes the tough decisions.
•I translate strategy into pragmatic actions with a constant focus on the business, the intended result, as well as the relationship with and interests of all stakeholders.
• I offer an analytical and strategic vision.
• I always bring passion, energy and ambition.
• I’m a strong believer in the ‘work hard, play hard’ ethos, and even more in having fun and laughing together.

🔸MY EXPERTISE
• Strategic advice for communications and reputation management
• Board & management level counseling
• Company, brand and executive positioning
• Connection between brand and marketing & communications
• Storytelling
• Issue, crisis and change communications
• Media relations and media training 
• Internal & external stakeholder management
• PR strategy, generating free publicity on and offline 
• Communicating about sustainability/CSR
• Develop, manage and coach (workshops) communications teams

profile_positions.description:
The board provides strategic advice for the managing director of Foodvalley NL and the team. As a board, we aim to put the Foodvalley ecosystem on the international map and increase the impact and influence of innovative food companies in the Netherlands.

Foodvalley NL is an independent international organisation working together with front runners to accelerate the global transition to a sustainable food system. The food system has to change more rapidly if we want to have tasty, affordable, healthy and sustainable food available for 10 billion people by the year 2050.

profile_positions.description:
Bol.com is a leading online retail platform in the Netherlands and Belgium. Part of global retail company Ahold Delhaize since 2012. Founded in 1999, bol.com was the first online bookstore in Europe.

Responsibilities at bol.com included:
•	manage of a team of >10 communications professionals
•	develop and implement the internal and external communications strategy and corporate story
•	PR incl. media relations, issue management and crisis communication
•	public affairs (PA), lobbying 
•	internal communications
•	events & brand activation (until 2020)
•	sustainability and corporate social responsibility (CSR).

Within this role I was:
•	member of the brand & performance marketing management team 
•	trusted advisor to the bol.com board & management
•	member of sub-IPO team 2021-2022
•	company spokesperson for media (Dutch speaking TV, radio and print) and other external stakeholders such as government and politicians in the Netherlands and Belgium (Flanders, Wallonia and Brussels) and at EU level (EU Commission & EU Parliament)
•	first contact person for Ahold Delhaize’s (global) communications teams.

Starting as a ‘one-woman team’ in 2014, I built and developed a fully-fledged communications department run by a team of > 10 professionals. At first, with a focus on PR and internal communications. Later, the team’s responsibilities were expanded to include events, public affairs (PA) and sustainability/CSR. I also initiated, implemented and developed the company's sustainability and PA agenda. 

The development of my role and team were strongly influenced by the rapid growth of bol.com between 2014 and 2022: # employees rose from approx. 600 to 3000 and turnover (net consumer sales) increased from EUR 680 million (2014) to EUR 5.46 billion (2021). In 2022: product range of 40+ million products (focus on non-food), 13 million customers and 50,000 local entrepreneurs/platform partners.

profile_positions.description:
Role: vice chairman
In the Netherlands the Works Council (In Dutch: Ondernemingraad, OR) is an internal body representing employees and promotes and protect the interest of the employee. The Works Council has consultation rights in respect of certain significant proposed management decisions. Furthermore, they have approval rights in respects of intended company decisions regarding employment policies.
profile_positions.title: Member Works council / Ondernemingsraad (OR)

profile_positions.description:
Meda Pharma (now Viatris) is an international pharmaceutical company for prescription and OTC medicines, including the well-known brands Betadine, CB12, Prioderm and EpiPen.

Established and developed this role within the Dutch organisation. I reported directly to the Dutch General Manager. 

Responsibilities at Meda Pharma included:
• develop and implement the communications strategy 
• develop and implement integrated PR campaigns (B2C & B2B/corporate & brand), working closely with the product managers for multi-channel marketing campaigns 
• manage the online content specialist (1FTE)
• build, maintain and intensify relationships with media, influencers and other stakeholders 
• spokesperson for media (TV, radio & print) 
• manage creative agencies
• draft media relations documents such as press releases and Q&As.

Results & achievements:
• Developed communications as a discipline and integrated this into the marketing department. 
• Developed stakeholder management policy and established initial media relations.
• Supported development of a new CRM tool for B2B communications (Meda Connects). 
• Introduced a new OTC product (CB12) to the Dutch market through a PR campaign.
• Introduced the 'Luizenradar' campaign in the Netherlands through PR, incl. spokesperson for TV, radio and print (national & regional).
profile_positions.title: Manager Communications & PR

profile_positions.description:
2twintig is a full-service PR agency for marketing, corporate and internal PR. 
Clients I worked for included: Unilever (OLA, Magnum, Calvé, Becel, Lipton), Nestlé (KitKat, Bros), Royal Sanders (Van Gils Parfums, Odorex, ProSet), GrandVision (Pearle & EyeWish), Secretary Plus, Grohe, Electrolux, Vliegtickets.nl, Wartsila and Mediq Pharmacy.

Responsibilities at 2twintig included:
• account manager and consultant to clients
• develop press approach: build and maintain media relations and generate free publicity on and offline (focus on marketing PR)
• organise events: PR stunts, press events, press trips
• advise spokespersons, develop Q&As
• text productions: advertorials and staff magazines
• media monitoring.

Results & achievements:
• I was the agency's first employee. I helped the agency grow from three people (including the two owners) and a limited number of clients to 12 employees and dozens of clients.
• Introduced a new product for Mediq Apotheek (Eau Thermale Avène) to the Dutch market via PR.
• Developed and implemented an internal communication strategy for Pearle (part of GrandVision), including a staff magazine.
• Generated free publicity nationally for various brand launches, product introductions and brand activations, such as Lipton disc golf, Magnum Mini and new KitKat and Bros products.

During my first two years in this job, I combined a three-day working week with a full-time master's study.
